Headline: Blue Line Service Delayed at O'Hare
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are standing at O'Hare due to signal problems. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are standing at O'Hare due to signal problems.

At this time, consider other service alternatives to service your trip such as other buses or buses to other rail lines. 

This may include: 
.
#56 Milwaukee
#81W West Lawrence 
#81 Lawrence 
#88 Higgins
#90 Harlem 
#92 Foster 

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
